thread.title: Fitness Software Pioneer, Adam Zeitsiff, Joins Leading SaaS
thread.title_full: Fitness Software Pioneer, Adam Zeitsiff, Joins Leading SaaS

author: h2 Wellness
title: Fitness Software Pioneer, Adam Zeitsiff, Joins Leading SaaS
text:
LOS ANGELES , Sept. 2,   h2 wellness ™ , a cloud-based, digital health, wellness and engagement company, today announced the expansion of its executive management team with the addition of Adam Zeitsiff as Chief Sales Officer. Zeitsiff will be responsible for leading the transformation of digital health, wellness and member engagement in the fitness industry.  He also will be opening h2's New York office in the fourth quarter of 2015.
Previously President of Jonas Fitness and Business Unit Manager at Jonas Software, Zeitsiff joins h2 with more than two decades of software and technology experience in C-suite positions, including the last 11 years in the fitness industry, with both EZFacility and Jonas Software.  He brings to h2 a proven record of successfully launching game-changing cloud software solutions, along with developing and executing strategies for maximizing the growth of emerging software businesses.
A successful entrepreneur, Zeitsiff has led multiple technology and software companies to market-leading positions.  His accomplishments include being the chief executive of a four-time Inc. 500 award-winning company and leading the sale of multiple software companies for significant returns. He recently was named as a 2015 CEO of the Year recipient by the Long Island Business News.  
"The team at h2 is excited to welcome Adam to our executive management team," said Houman Arasteh , co-founder and President of h2 Wellness. "His vast knowledge and experience in successfully building and implementing cloud software solutions, specifically in the fitness industry, uniquely positions him in this new role."
"As an entrepreneur who thrives on building high-value software solutions and growing a company's market presence, the decision to join h2's executive team and help lead the charge toward market dominance is an easy one," Zeitsiff said.  "Everyone at h2 is passionate about evolving how fitness and healthcare companies engage their members to help improve health outcomes.  I'm excited about the opportunity to work closely with such a dedicated team of people and help integrate the fitness industry into the broader healthcare system."
About h2 wellness ™ 
Founded in 2005, h2 Wellness is a cloud-based, digital engagement company that allows health and wellness brands worldwide to improve the lives of their customers and increase customer satisfaction, retention and revenues. Its platform helps clients provide their customers with attractive, innovative digital strategies in a cost-effective, timely manner, eliminating the risk of software development and ongoing maintenance. h2's platform is used by millions of consumers in 15 countries and nine languages, as offered by leading companies in the healthcare, wellness, fitness, weight loss, direct selling and corporate health markets. For more information, visit www.h2wellness.com .
